Makes vanilla propick readings scale linearly (0-1) instead of the default 0-0.75 range. This affects all propick readings, not just the new density mode. Works instantly. Feedback is appreciated!

Multiplies the sampling radius for ore detection. By default, ores are sampled in 4 chunks around the current position but PPT are calculated as if it was 1 chunk. A value of 1.0 is the current behavior. 0.5 would mean it only checks the current chunk radius. Higher values will make density readings appear too high, while lower values will require sampling every chunk for accuracy. Feedback is appreciated! /reprospect for old readings

settings.title: Total Factor toggles. ( Low factor from other mods fixes )

settings.comment: Readings only display values above 0.0025 factor. Turning this on will add all those even single-block ores as traces, whereas in base game they wouldn't be registered. I'd recommend against enabling.

settings.ingui: Uplift all unregistered generators ores to poor instead
settings.comment: Only for ores that do not have a registered generator, i.e. Interesting Ore Gen. Requires the Uplift to trace enabled. This would make the PPT values visible, unlike traces. Can lead to erroneous exaggerations of very low counts of ore/gems but some mods without integration might require this.

settings.ingui: Uplift all ores to poor instead
settings.comment: Requires the Uplift to trace enabled. This would make the PPT values visible, unlike previously. Can lead to erroneous exaggerations of very low counts of ore/gems but some mods without integration might require this. Highly unrecommended. If enabled, also supercedes and automatically enables the previous setting. Usually the previous feature is enough.
